data.title: Amazon, Microsoft and other titans face scrutiny in report about killer-robot tech
data.text: Dutch activists are voicing concerns about technologies that could open the way for lethal autonomous weapons – such as AI software, facial recognition and swarming aerial systems – and are wondering where several tech titans including Amazon and Microsoft stand.

data.title: Microsoft The Latest To Be Criticized For Using Humans To Listen To User Audio
data.text: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ: MSFT) is the latest tech company to be criticized for using humans to review audio captured through devices, raising more privacy concerns about in-home tech.

data.title: Can the Minecraft Deal Boost Microsoft's Gaming Segment?
data.text: Microsoft's new partnership with Nvidia could give its gaming segment a much-needed push.

data.title: Microsoft admits using contractors to listen to Xbox gamers
data.text: Microsoft has admitted hiring contractors to listen to audio of Xbox users after reports that children were among those that had been heard.

data.title: Microsoft Scores Points as it Solidifies its Video Gaming Ecosystem
data.text:
It's not going to make an immediate impact on MSFT stock, for better or worse, but in time gaming will be a very big deal for Microsoft. 
The post Microsoft Scores Points as it Solidifies its Video Gaming Ecosystem appeared first on InvestorPlace.
